code: import{http}from"./http";export async function listUsers(){let limit=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:500;const{data}=await http.get("/users",{params:{limit}});return data;}export async function createUser(payload){const{data}=await http.post("/users",payload);return data;}export async function updateUser(userId,payload){const{data}=await http.patch("/users/".concat(userId),payload);return data;}export async function setUserRole(userId,role){const{data}=await http.patch("/users/".concat(userId,"/role"),null,{params:{role}});return data;}export async function setUserEstado(userId,estado){const{data}=await http.patch("/users/".concat(userId,"/estado"),{estado});return data;}export async function deleteUser(userId){const{data}=await http.delete("/users/".concat(userId));return data;}
